main event: A civilian observed a bright, round unidentified flying object in Washington, D.C., on April 29, 1965, for a duration of 18 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared as bright as the brightest star, exhibiting motion that included flashing and flickering with a strobing and pulsing effect., The object emitted no sound during the observation., Observers noted that the object faded away slowly while in sight., The color of the object was reported to be white or gray., The sighting occurred in clear weather conditions with visibility of the night sky.
sighted object: a bright round object in the sky
witness description: A civilian who reported the sighting to the Air Force.
